name: Dime Pay
author: dimepay

sections.description:
Dime Pay plugin is a custom payment gateway for WooCommerce that allows you to securely process payments through our platform.

Features:
– Secure payment processing
– Easy integration with WooCommerce

Third Party Services:
– This plugin uses the external service Dime Pay
– Dime Pay
– Terms Of Service
– Privacy Policy

Supported Countries

  • Jamaica
  • Rest of the Caribbean coming soon

Contact

For support or inquiries, please contact us at support@dimepay.net.

Acknowledgements

Special thanks to the WooCommerce team for their robust eCommerce platform and to the contributors who helped in the development of this plugin.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPL-2.0+ license. See the GPL-2.0 for more information.
sections.installation:
1. Go to wp admin and select plugins
  2. search for dime pay
  3. Press the install button and then the activate button after installation
  4. Configure the payment gateway settings through WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  5. Add your secret key in the field provided
  • Manual Install
  1. Click download button to get files
  2. Go to wp admin and select plugins
  3. Select add plugin and upload plugin
  4. Press the upload plugin button and select the dime-for-woocommerce zip file
  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  6. Configure the payment gateway settings through WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  7. Add your secret key in the field provided
sections.faq:
How do I configure the Dime Pay payment gateway?

Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments and click on “Dime Pay” to enter your API keys and configure the gateway settings.

What are the requirements for using Dime Pay?

Dime Pay requires WooCommerce version 5.0 or higher and WordPress version 5.0 or higher. PHP 7.4 or higher is also required.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release of Dime Pay payment gateway.
